body_html: @byronyi: do you see any significant performance improvements with this change? We experimented with per-numa-node buffer allocation a long time ago, and didn't see any significant effect on our platforms. I suppose we should revisit the question.
body_text: @byronyi: do you see any significant performance improvements with this change?  We experimented with per-numa-node buffer allocation a long time ago, and didn't see any significant effect on our platforms.  I suppose we should revisit the question.
body: @byronyi: do you see any significant performance improvements with this change?  We experimented with per-numa-node buffer allocation a long time ago, and didn't see any significant effect on our platforms.  I suppose we should revisit the question.
